text_block_list.text: On a day off, I headed to the shopping mall, where I saw ——

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
No, that's not it! No es correctooo!! 
I'm talking more "Earth! Wind! Fire!"……

A familiar voice echoed through the halls. 
I better find its owner before she starts 
asking about the village people……

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Liiike I saaiiid! I want something nimbler, more whooshy and El-like!

text_block_list.name: Shop Assistant
text_block_list.text: Wo… Whooshy, did you say, miss? Can I interest you in these, perhaps…?

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Mmmm… disappointing! I need something stronger, 
where I can feel the power when hitting the ground…

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Uuuuy～ How do I get you to understand…? Haah, if only Trainer was here ——

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Qué?! Th-That voice…… Trainer?!

El Condor Pasa had been trying to buy herself running shoes, 
but ran into trouble communicating with the store clerk.
choice_data_list: You just want shoes that suit you, yeah?
You just want shoes that suit you, yeah?

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
¡Bueno! But I don't know how to tell her. 
It's all gibberish in my head, I'm losing hope.

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
But, Trainer, you know what I mean, right? 
'Cause you're my trainer!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
And you can explain it to the clerk, can't you? 
We're an outstanding tag team after all!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
¡Gracias! Grateful and with tender eyes, El's all smiles! 
There's nothing to fear when you're here, Trainer!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
I want shoes that are light like the wind, but sharply 
turning and also protective like the earth… something 
fiery like that!

Taking in her words, I asked the shop assistant for breathable 
shoes with good grip and cushioning in a bright shade…

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Great job, Trainer! These are the shoes I wanted to a tee!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
I knew it, we understand each other! Our bond's strong! 
Our trust deep! Truly birds of a feather!!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: It's almost like my tag play with mama. One time, when she took me shopping for a celebration present ——

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Aaaaah, that's right!! Trainer! 
There's just one more place El wants to go!!

So saying, the place El Condor Pasa took me to 
turned out to be a fast food restaurant.

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Mmm～ I can smell the juicy aroma from here… Aaah, everything looks delicious～
choice_data_list: I'm helping pick from the menu this time?
I'm helping pick from the menu this time?

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Hehen, no es correcto! Wait here, Trainer!
And with that, El Condor Pasa went to line up at the counter…

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: I bring fooood!!

The food she'd bought laid spread out on the table. 
…… However ——

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Is it the plate or the coating that burns crimson!? 
No, it's the fries themselves that are on fire!!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Spiciness is deliciousness! Deliciousness is crimson! 
Red, hot, spicy! El's Special Fries await yoouuu!!
choice_data_list: I feel these words do not bode well…

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Mm-hm-hmm. Are you curious, Trainer? About the redness of these fries…!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Wonder no longer, El will tell you all about it! 
That's right, this is the power of my family's secret sauce!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: They finally sent me a jar yesterday, so I came to use it all up!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
No worries, El guarantees it tastes great! 
Papa loves spicy and even he jumps up 
and down for this sauce!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Come, come, Trainer! Go right ahead!!

This sounds like a danger to even have near my mouth. 
It'll be tough, but I should respectfully decline to ——

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Ehehe, you're the first one I ever shared this sauce with, Trainer.

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Mama always taught me, "This sauce is special, 
you should only eat it with family" ——

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
—— "It's far too dangerous a stimulus 
for people who aren't used to it".

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
That's right, it's a precious sauce that should only 
be served to those you love and trust!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: But you're one of those special people!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Because you're El's partner! We're basically 
like family, so you can eat it too!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Ehehe. It's a sauce full of love! To thank you 
for always doing your best for me.

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Let's share this and build up our tolerance together! 
After you, Trainer…

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Great, eat up! Ahaha, the food won't run away. 
Take your time and enjoy it!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
So… what do you think? Do you feel the fire 
of passion growing hotter inside you!?

I'd steeled myself to eat this, but it was actually 
not as bad as I'd feared. In fact, I could see myself 
get addicted to this spicy flavo—

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Ahahaaa! It's so tasty it makes you want to jump 
up and down, right!? I'm so happy you like it!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
You can have a bit of mine if you want! Eat as much as you like! 
I wanted to thank you, after all!

After that event, I lost feeling in my tongue for a while, 
but strangely, I thought I also felt some sort of power 
well up from deep down in my guts…… maybe.
